text: Excellent work.  Fun to speak with and very knowledgeable  Highly recommend.

name: Sanja S., verified patient
text: The doc was funny and professional, front staff quick and patient.  I’d go back.

name: Erin M., verified patient
text: I am a fan! The office is kind and helpful, esp concerning insurance.

name: Alycia M., verified patient
text: Amazing! Wanted to find a new doc close to work and he's the guy!  Saw me right at my appointed time and I was out of there about 30 min later.  Super friendly and explains everything clearly!!

name: Initials hidden
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable and he takes your lifestyle into account when making recommendations.

name: David M., verified patient
text: Super quick, very friendly, and saw me earlier than may appointment. Would definitely return to this doctor.

name: Initials hidden
text: The front desk staff (go Ruth & Ro!) and Dr. Schafran are all a delight. They're easy to work with and well educated in eye care.

name: Christopher T., verified patient
text: Excellent and quick eye exam and contact lenses exam.  Reasonable price.

name: Stephanie M., verified patient
text: I’ve been seeing him for several years.  He’s excellent and bring my children to him as well.

name: Initials hidden
text: Very nice guy and quick service.

name: Arnold S., verified patient
text: Very professional, great experience. I have been using Dr. Schafran for glasses for the last five years. The staff that helps choose frames are very helpful and friendly.

name: Allison L., verified patient
text: Neil Schafran was extremely unprofessional and I would never return. He used the examination time as a means to belittle me and question me about women's inequality, which despite his archaic views was extremely inappropriate. Definitely would not suggest coming here!!!

name: Initials hidden
text: Very professional! Did not try to make sale, but definitely cared about my comfort and eyesight. We tried lenses until we got the right ones!

name: Emily S., verified patient
text: Dr. Neil was excellent, and the rest of the staff was very friendly and helpful as well. Answered all of my questions, and didn't mind helping me, the most indecisive person in the world, pick out a pair of eyeglasses. Very knowledgeable about my insurance plan as well.

name: Tyberius A., verified patient
text: The front desk staff were terrific and Dr. Schafran was the best. I never thought anyone would be as good as my previous Optometrist whom I could not see anymore due to the distance since I relocated, but Dr. Schafran exceeded my expectations!

name: Melissa K., verified patient
text: Dr. Schafran was kind and professional. I was out of the office within 30 minutes of arriving. He corrected an issue with my contact lenses and gave me a trial pair to test.

name: Maria P., verified patient
text: Friendly,  funny and compassionate!

name: Michael B., verified patient
text: Very courteous and knowledgeable.  Fixed me up right away!  Thank you Dr. Mohrmann!

name: Karsten C., verified patient
text: Dr Mohrmann saw my son right away and had a great bedside manner with both of us.  They quickly X-rayed my son's ankle and diagnosed his fracture.  We received all of this plus crutches and a very comfortable boot within 25 minutes. A pleasant experience all around.

name: Dong Eun S., verified patient
text: I was a little worried after reading some negative reviews, but he was great in every possible way during my visit. I'd definitely recommend him!

name: Initials hidden
text: Very professional, answered all my questions.

name: Harvey C., verified patient
text: Excellent

name: Ashley D., verified patient
text: Dr. Mohrmann is always prompt, pleasant, and knowledgeable. Highly recommend.

name: Aasim S., verified patient
text: Dr. Mohrmann was very nice, efficient, and helpful. He made me feel comfortable and gave excellent care. Would recommend.

name: Rachellle N., verified patient
text: Amazing he treated my pained offered OT and explain my pain .. I give him 10 stars

name: Mercedes C., verified patient
text: Amazing! Great team. I arrived early and was seen in a very timely matter. Began treatment right away, with my follow up appointment already set. Looking forward to going back and getting to the root of my problem!  Very satifised.

text: Dr. Mohrmann is a great doctor and all his staff are lovely people.

text: He was excellent.  Would recommend anyone who needs an ortho to see him.

text: He was great and helpful.

name: Joan D., verified patient
text: Dr. Mohrmann and his staff were wonderful!

name: J P, verified patient
text: Very pleasant doctor & staff.

name: Patrick I., verified patient
text: Had the benefit of an on-premises x-ray diagnosis that confirmed the latest condition of a wrist injury that had been in a cast for a month resulting in a conservative PT approach. Have been making good progress with the doctor's treatment approach.

name: Lara W., verified patient
text: Fast and efficient.  This was the 4th doctor I had seen since my wrist was broken and this doctor did not make me feel paranoid about not having surgery.

name: Susan Y., verified patient
text: It was a great experience. I went in with a broken finger. He answered all of my questions and concerns, explained the break to me, and had me fitted immediately with a splint and it's already starting to feel better than before. So, all round a great experience.

name: Samantha B., verified patient
text: I have seen him twice now for two different accidents and he is extremely knowledgeable. He did a surgery on my thumb 2 years ago and when I recently injured my finger I looked him up again because I know he is the best

name: Christopher C., verified patient
text:
I was seen by the receptionist upon arrival and was called into the room quickly then seen by the doctor almost immediately.  I was actually out of the office within a half an hour and that was with removing my cast and X-rays.
Always professional!

name: Padmanabhan R., verified patient
text: Went for a followup after a suggested MRI was done. Prior treatment from Dr Mohrmann seems to have cured my issues. Excellent practise.

name: Padmanabhan R., verified patient
text: Very short wait used doing the paperwork. Very professional environment, friendly and competent staff, and all the equipment needed to make a diagnosis and start treatment. Dr. Mohrmann was quick to identify and treat the issues I had, and his support staff took care of the rest.

name: John P., verified patient
text: he addressed  the issues

name: Jennifer A., verified patient
text: Amazing!!!

text: Dr. Mohrmann and staff was very attentive and courteous. They answered all of my questions and delivered the best treatment. I highly recommend him.

text: office staff is extremely helpful and attentive. I've had bilateral carpal and cubital tunnel and I've been getting a great treatment plan with medical equipment and occupational therapy.

text: Excellent Doctor

name: Initials hidden
text: The entire staff was very friendly and welcoming.  I felt very comfortable and confident in that they will be able to fix my injury.  The x-rays and diagnosis were very quick and to the point.  I have to undergo surgery so this is the extent of my current experience.

name: Emily M., verified patient
text: While Dr. Mohrmann is a bit clinical in tone, he's very clear and was incredibly knowledgable.  He explained in perfectly confident detail what was going on with my hand (I had a slightly torn tendon).

name: Nicholas I., verified patient
text: Nothing better than a knowledgeable professional who listens to and works with you to solve whatever problems you are having. That may sound simple but it can be hard to find and Dr. Khan is all those good things and more.

name: Hanka K., verified patient
text: Staff was very friendly and Dr. Khan was very approachable. Super easy to ask questions and she was very clear on her answers. Definitely would recommend!

name: Initials hidden
text: Dr. Khan and the other staff are very nice and accommodating.  Dr. Khan is very attentive and addresses anything you have concerns about.  Overall it was a great visit!

text: Great Dr! Was very attentive and listened to all my questions, helped me lots!

text: Her staff was professional and courteous.  Dr. Khan is personable and very knowledgeable.  Definitely happy that I found her through ZocDoc.

text: Dr. Khan and her staff were very prompt and professional. The appointment was easy to make, and I was in to see the doctor in a very reasonable amount of time. Surprised this office is as available as it is!

text: She’s very thorough and excellent bedside manner

text:
Dr Khan was professional, very quick to diagnose and also ran all the subsequent blood tests. She gave us the feeling of confidence and her office is a well run ship. 
As a side note her sense of humor also lightened the mood. We recommend.

name: Adriana S., verified patient
text:
Very nice! When you walk off the elevator it’s the door to you right (not the most clear as the lobby doesn’t look like a usua doctor office). 

Everyone was attentive and accommodating. They didn’t make me feel rushed and I felt comfortably right away!

text: I have had the best medical experience with Dr. Khan. She spends time with me and listens to my concerns. I have already recommended her to my staff at work and will continue to do so.

text: Dr. Kahn is in tune. She listens and is very thorough. Her office is really a 1 stop shop. Bloodwork,  ultrasounds,  cat scans, x-rays.  Both a PCP and an urgent care facility. The front desk is on the ball too.  They really go the step above. Thank you!

name: Patrick I., verified patient
text: Had the benefit of an on-premises x-ray diagnosis that confirmed the latest condition of a wrist injury that had been in a cast for a month resulting in a conservative PT approach. Have been making good progress with the doctor's treatment approach.

name: Lara W., verified patient
text: Fast and efficient.  This was the 4th doctor I had seen since my wrist was broken and this doctor did not make me feel paranoid about not having surgery.

name: Susan Y., verified patient
text: It was a great experience. I went in with a broken finger. He answered all of my questions and concerns, explained the break to me, and had me fitted immediately with a splint and it's already starting to feel better than before. So, all round a great experience.

name: Samantha B., verified patient
text: I have seen him twice now for two different accidents and he is extremely knowledgeable. He did a surgery on my thumb 2 years ago and when I recently injured my finger I looked him up again because I know he is the best

name: Christopher C., verified patient
text:
I was seen by the receptionist upon arrival and was called into the room quickly then seen by the doctor almost immediately.  I was actually out of the office within a half an hour and that was with removing my cast and X-rays.
Always professional!

name: Padmanabhan R., verified patient
text: Went for a followup after a suggested MRI was done. Prior treatment from Dr Mohrmann seems to have cured my issues. Excellent practise.

text: he addressed  the issues
